title: What's with feeders using drugs??
body:
I'm constantly getting feeders in my games who say "nah I'm high" or something, just had an Urgot going 0/11 saying he "won't do crack tomorrow"

What's with these drug users? Not to mention pretentious smokers who say "brb going for a smoke" like smoking is a thing to be proud of

replies.body:
Well, he was obviosly on drugs, as he played Urgot.


Haha
Some of us are on amphetamines because the government believes that amphetamines is the cure to A.D.D. I now have the government to thank for my addiction...

There's always the possibility that they aren't actually on drugs and just need a hip excuse as to why they didn't try/feed. Or maybe they were and are exaggerating for comical effect, as if your game has magically become Pineapple Express (which is a lot less fun than it sounds).

well are they any worse than people playing ranked at like 3am and are totally out of it and sleep deprived (I am guilty of the all-night ranked grind myself). In ranked you can just report them if they do bad and in normals who cares.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightjar,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=g5xa4MEc,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-29T12:45:36.496+0000)
>
> well are they any worse than people playing ranked at like 3am and are totally out of it and sleep deprived (I am guilty of the all-night ranked grind myself). In ranked you can just report them if they do bad and in normals who cares.

I care so much =( http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/y3y9Hcgn-aram-team-serious-aram-players-only?comment=0009 But playing when you can't really play straight is especially silly if it's ranked. #much{{item:3190}}  #notheartshaped #closeenough

Smoking to relieve the stress of playing LoL lol and people are probably using drugs while playing because of all the nice, bright, colorful effects combined with being under influence looks so groooooooooovy. I'm not a druggy -.- Has any body else been getting this please??? http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/RMx2uXLA-increase-the-remake-time-to-51015-minutes
Coz people think they are cool if they say they are on drugs or drinking when 90% of the time they are not
